data.actual_result: You're able to do strange actions that probably shouldn't be visible within the Activity tab.
data.expected_result: Settings like creating channels shouldn't be visible. These settings would be expected to only appear if you're actually inside the server.
data.short_description: You can create a channel through the Activity tab.
data.steps_to_repro: - Own, or have Manage Channels permission on a server. - On that server, have multiple friends join a voice channel and play games so it appears in the Activity tab. - Open the Activity tab. - Find your friends, then right click the name of the voice channel.
